root.name: Project Firestart
root.description: Developed in 1989 by Dynamix and published by EA, Project Firestart used the technology of the Commodore 64 to it's limits.The story of the game is set in the year 2066 where a genetic experiment went awry and, as a result, genetically engineered monsters run amok aboard the space research vessel Prometheus. The player is sent to investigate the matter and, if necessary, start the ship's self-destruct sequence and escape before it explodes.
